author: Business Insider
description:
It took California a century to produce a pistachio harvest. Now, it's the world's top supplier. But as the Dubai chocolate trend fuels demand, and California droughts intensify, growers are fighting to keep up.

07:55 - Processing Pistachios
10:40 - Wonderful Pistachios Gets Into Business
12:51 - How California Moves Water
20:31 - Why Small Farms Are Drying Out
23:31 - How Wonderful Pistachios Grew Its Sales
25:06 - The Global Pistachio Market
26:25 - A Persian Restaurant Keeping Iranian Traditions Alive
29:41 - California Growers Fight On
31:02 - Credits
